column4: Is this the appropriate channel to ask about specific applications on Ubuntu? Specifically, I was wondering how to make Rhythmbox open a window instead of creating an icon in the notication area by default
Another question: why did volume control disappear from my panel when I upgraded to Lucid? How do I put it back?
Add to Panel - Indicator Applet, i think
ah yes, that did it. Too bad it comes with other things I don't really care about. :(
